title: ToTheTop
short: Go as high as you can at the speed of the music without falling off the ladders!
description: ToTheTop is a mini-game where you have to go as high as you can at the speed of the music without falling off the ladders!
It targets mobile devices and has been made with Unity3D and C#.
The game isn't available on the Google Play Store yet because it is still in development, but the entire projet can be found at the GitHub link below.
